item.title: 2025 CTCF Club League
item.description: The 2025 CTCF Club League is Cape Town’s premier team chess competition, bringing together the region’s strongest clubs in an 11-round tournament played over three months. The league showcases both established masters and rising talents, fostering competitive spirit and community among local players. With the season still underway, every round remains crucial as teams battle for top honors and bragging rights in one of South Africa’s most prestigious club events.

item.title: 2014 AfriClub Champs
item.description: In March 2014, Cape Town proudly hosted the prestigious African Club Chess Championship at the Sun Hotel. The event brought together top club teams from across the continent, showcasing Africa’s finest chess talent in a spirit of competition and camaraderie. Players battled over the boards in a festival of strategy and skill, while the Mother City provided a fitting backdrop with its vibrant culture and iconic scenery. The tournament not only highlighted the growing strength of African chess but also reinforced Cape Town’s reputation as a hub for international sporting events.
